column4: metric1983,maybe u need to see if there are proprietary drivers for your card the opensource drivers work great for compiz but not so good at gaming
do you know of a way to test my graphics card to see if it is working, it might just not be good enough for latest wow though i know it has worked perfectly for burning crusade
u can try and install alien-arena , nexuiz, or one of the other egoshooter opensource games and see how that goes, u can download them from the ubuntu software center
